# Introduction {#intro}

\acr[case=sentence]{RL} can be capitalized when the long name is in the beginning of a sentence.

On the other hand, \acr{AI} is not capitalized in the middle of a sentence.

{{< acr AI first_use=true case=sentence >}} can also be capitalized when using shortcodes. 

\acr[case=sentence]{mRNA} is capitalized when the long name is at the beginning of a sentence.

\acr[case=sentence]{mRNA} is not capitalized when the short name is used.
